content.text: How has your week been going?
Good! I've been learning more about music theory.
That's great! Music is my number one passion.
What do you like to play?
I play guitar and piano. I'm not very good at either, but I enjoy it.
That's cool! I can only play guitar.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of music, but I'm really into rock and roll right now.
Nice! I love rock and roll too.
Have you ever been to a concert?
Yes, I've been to a few concerts. I saw Metallica a few years ago and it was amazing.
I'm jealous! I've always wanted to see Metallica.
You should definitely go see them if you get the chance. They're an amazing band.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! Have a great day!
